items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: FileFlow is a lightweight, Blazor-based web app for secure peer-to-peer file sharing. It uses end-to-end encryption and real-time transfer via WebRTC and SignalR — all without cloud storage, file size limits, or user accounts.
items.title: MSUMusketeers/P2PFileTransfer: FileFlow is a lightweight, Blazor-based web app for secure peer-to-peer file sharing. It uses end-to-end encryption and real-time transfer via WebRTC and SignalR — all without cloud storage, file size limits, or user accounts.

items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
